headline: Why Dividends Are Better Than Stock Buybacks
summary: Stock buybacks are replacing dividends as the biggest source of capital returns.  Dividends are a cash payout to a shareholder, while buybacks remove shares, giving remaining shareholders a larger stake of a company.  The S&P 500’s dividend yield has been shrinking.
